description: An aptly named pair of mitts! The Roomy comes in fun colours and prints and offers an extra-wide cuff so they’re easier to pull over jacket sleeves. With a recycled water-resistant shell, 100% recycled polyester ACCU-DRI® moisture-wicking lining, and PRIMALOFT® Gold P.U.R.E.™ insulation, this style provides comfort for your child so they can fully experience the magic of winter: build a snowman, go tobogganing with the family, spend the weekend outdoors at the cabin… and so much more!<br><br>The Roomy kids’ mitts rank 4 on our warmth level scale.
name: Roomy Mitts - Child
